Name: Scythians
History: The Scythians are a nomadic faction which can build its buildings anywhere on the map. Their buildings cost -50% resources and build time, but have -50% health and capture resistance. They have limited infantry, but a full roster of light and heavy cavalry. They have a raiding and looting bonus, and are excellent herders and hunters.

CivBonuses.Name: Nomadism
CivBonuses.History: The Scythians were a nomadic pastoral people.
CivBonuses.Description: Scythian structures have no territory bonus and are weak, but are very cheap and quick to build.

CivBonuses.Name: Plunderers
CivBonuses.History: The Scythians sustained their economy through plunder.
CivBonuses.Description: Every enemy unit killed or building destroyed gives additional resources to the Huns' treasury.

Factions.Name: Scythian Nomads
Factions.Description: The nomadic tribal confederation of central Asia.

Technologies.Name: Falconry
Technologies.Description: All Structures and Cavalry +25% vision range. Cavalry +25% meat gathering rate.

Technologies.Name: Great Settlement
Technologies.History: The Scythians eventually conquered and settled cities along the Black Sea coast, founding powerful kingdoms on the Bosporus.
Technologies.Description: Stone Walls and Fortresses are unlocked for the Scythians, and their structures can no longer pack and move, consequently gaining +50% health and +50% cost.

Technologies.Name: Parthian Tactics
Technologies.Description: Ranged cavalry will automatically run away when enemies are near and turn to shoot them once minimum range has been met.
